column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Abso-freaking-lutely. Whenever I have a friend in town
column2: this is the place I'll take them. However
column3: this really isn't somewhere you can do your work at. They only have wifi starting at 2pm (which makes sense
column4: since they have so many customers and they don't want you to take up a table if you're just sitting there)
column5: and even when they do have wifi
column6: it is super shotty. I tried to bring my laptop one time and plan a trip with a friend
column7: but it did not go well. But overall
column8: this is still an awesome bakery/cafe!
